name: Anzu (RunninBlood)
description:
We are two brothers who love making games! Wastyr does the developing for the games and RunninBlood does the pixel-art. Anzu is our first full release of one of our projects, but we have much more to come! if you'd like regular updates of what we are working on you can follow us here!

RunninBlood (Artist): https://twitter.com/RunninBlood

Wastyr (Dev): https://twitter.com/Wasstyr

Thanks for all the support!

Special thanks to @ryan.john.martini on instagram for the menu and game music!
